overview:
Start-up to $50mm leadership experience. Enterprise, Social and Mobile Software. Consulting and SI with Global Delivery with relationships across US, Europe and Asia Pacific. Applying experience, value and consultative selling to both software and services.

Currently Founder and CEO at Best of Breed Technology Partners (bobpartners.com), a consulting and system integration firm focused on Social Networking and Mobile Technologies. Successful consulting and enterprise software leadership experience in Healthcare, Retail, and Financial markets. Previously President and CEO of TamGroup, a regional IBM systems integrator and reseller of Portal and Content Management Software. Acquired by Ascendant Technology, the largest IBM Systemâ€™s Integrator for Social Computing and Portal Services. Previously CEO at Headpedal, providing customer-facing service solutions to telecommunications customers. A consultant delivering management expertise and capital to start-ups, and was a Founder of an analytic applications company.

Career includes successful start-ups, IPO, and venture capital experience. Expertise covers Consulting, Global Delivery, Social Computing (web 2.0), Portal, e-business, CRM, Application Development, and Business Intelligence. Haved lived and worked on four continents and completed business transactions in over 20 countries.
